title: Magisk v24.2 released with Zygisk improvements, stability fixes, and much more
content:
As of 2022, Magisk is the most popular and recommended rooting solution for devices running Android. Created by John Wu, aka XDA Recognized Developer topjohnwu, the Magisk project has gradually evolved into a much more diverse and powerful tool beyond just plain root. A big part of its success comes from the developerâ€™s consistency and

The post Magisk v24.2 released with Zygisk improvements, stability fixes, and much more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest public beta build of Magisk (v24.2) has been released with several bug fixes and Zygisk related improvements. Read on to know more!
